overview: Vicky is a creative graphic and web designer with over ten years’ commercial experience. Starting her career working for a popular Health and Beauty magazine, she then progressed to a large advertising agency in Central London where she worked for several years. ​ ﻿ After setting up on her own, dealing with large corporate clients like Carlsberg, Taylor Wimpey, Buck Consultants, Bupa, Savills and Chesterton, Vicky joined forces with Donna and Design Fusion London was created. ​ Vicky has a strong mix of skills ranging from brand identity, large corporate brochures, signage, advertising to web development. She takes pride in providing a professional and unique approach to each and every project she is involved in.
